none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 10, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 More underappreciated 2010s magic from the PNW - not Olympia this time but just an hour north and undoubtedly connected. Sharp, choppy, urgent punk of the highest order with flanged guitars and femme vocals up front - brings to mind BAYONETTES and GORILLA ANGREB but also the first couple of WHITE LUNG records, all with a perfectly dreary undertone. The highlight is the guitar break into the slow finish to "Annuit Coeptis" that wraps the tape like landing your entire listening experience with care are grace. Can you image if someone could land your life with the same care? That would be cool. PARANOID TIME

seo.title: Paranoid Time - Paranoid Time - Terminal Escape
